name: Photography Workshop-Tour: Learn how to control your camera whilst exploring London
description: Whilst walking the streets of London my tour is all about learning photography, digital or film... achieving this through the manual control of the camera whilst understanding the importance of light and composition in order to capture poetic and repeatable results.. I will teach you how to best operate your camera whilst exploring this fascinating city, on a tour that takes us from the East end, by foot to the Thames in central London.
